table.name: quest_person
table.comment: Stores people related to Quest Students (parents, guardians, siblings).

field.name: id
field.comment: Unique Person ID

field.name: contact_id
field.comment: FK to Contact ID

field.name: relationship_id
field.comment: Relationship to Student (e.g. Mother, Father, Sister...). FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: is_parent_guardian
field.comment: Is this person a parent or guardian (primary caregiver)?

field.name: is_sibling
field.comment: Is this person a parent or guardian (primary caregiver)?

field.name: first_name
field.comment: First Name.

field.name: last_name
field.comment: Last Name.

field.name: marital_status_id
field.comment: FK to civicrm_option_value.

field.name: separated_year
field.comment: Year parents separated or divorced (only YYYY is significant).

field.name: is_deceased
field.comment: True / False / Dont Know

field.name: deceased_year
field.comment: Year deceased (only YYYY is significant).

field.name: age
field.comment: Persons age (years).

field.name: lived_with_from_age
field.comment: Age of student when they began living with this person.

field.name: lived_with_to_age
field.comment: Age of student when they stopped living with this person.

field.name: industry_id
field.comment: Industry person works in (or unemployed).

field.name: job_organization
field.comment: Name of business or organization where person works.

field.name: job_occupation
field.comment: Occupation or job title.

field.name: job_current_years
field.comment: Number of years working in current job.

field.name: highest_school_level_id
field.comment: Highest level of schooling completed by this person (used for Parents/Guardians).

field.name: current_school_level_id
field.comment: Current school level of this person (used for Siblings).

field.name: college_name
field.comment: Name of college attended.

field.name: college_country_id
field.comment: Country of where person attended college.

field.name: college_grad_year
field.comment: Year completed college (only YYYY is significant).

field.name: college_major
field.comment: Area of concentration or major in college.

field.name: prof_school_name
field.comment: Name of professional or graduate school attended.

field.name: prof_school_degree_id
field.comment: Professional or graduate school degree type.

field.name: prof_grad_year
field.comment: Year completed professional or graduate school (only YYYY is significant).

field.name: description
field.comment: Additional information about this person (comments for Siblings).
